attributes.title: Gravity Is "Bi" Not "One" - Revelations on Solar Eclipse Day || 26 Dec 2019
attributes.description:
Glimpses from Nithya Satsang with The Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism HDH Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam 26 December 2019 POWERFUL COGNITIONS FROM TODAY’S NITHYANANDA (ENGLISH) SATSANG

MESSAGE FROM PARAMASHIVA, FROM SHRIKAILASA DIRECTLY: FEELING, COGNISING THE LIFE AS IT IS HAPPENING IN YOU AS EVERYTHING BRINGS LOVE, COMPASSION, INTENSITY, ONENESS.
I AM GOING TO MAP THIS TRUTH - JNANA - INTO PRAJNA AND MANIFEST IT AS VIJNANA FOR ALL OF US. I AM MAPPING THIS GREAT KNOWLEDGE INTO MY PRAJNA - CONSCIOUSNESS - AND MANIFESTING IT AS VIJNANA - REALITY - FOR ALL OF US.
RIGHT NOW, THE PARTIAL SOLAR ECLIPSE IS HAPPENING. IT IS THE MOST SACRED HAPPENING. DURING SOLAR ECLIPSE YOU SHOULD WEAR YOUR UPPER CLOTH, SO PLEASE WEAR IT. I WANT TO TELL A FEW TRUTHS TO THE WHOLE WORLD, TO MY DEVOTEES AND DISCIPLES AND LEAD THEM INTO A MEDITATION PROCESS NOW.
I AM NOW SEEING WITH THOUSANDS OF EYES BLESSED BY SAMAYAPURAM KANNATHAL. WITH HER GRACE AND BLESSINGS, SHE HAS GIVEN THOUSANDS OF EYES THAT ARE SEEING THROUGH ME. WITH THAT KNOWLEDGE, WITH PARASHAKTI’S THOUSANDS OF EYES, WHATEVER SHE IS SEEING THROUGH ME AND REVEALING, I AM SHARING AS IT IS. IN FRONT OF KALABHAIRAVA I CAN STAND WITH FOLDED HANDS AND SAY WITH ALL MY INTEGRITY TO YOU, “I AM REVEALING THE TRUTH AS IT IS WITH PARAMASHIVA AND SARASWATI’S GRACE.” I WILL REVEAL THE TRUTH AS IT IS.
GRAVITY IS “BI” NOT “ONE”. THERE IS A FORCE WHICH IS FUNCTIONING AS WAVE AND WHICH IS STATIC. THERE ARE 4 FORCES ON YOU - THE WAVING ENERGY WHICH PULLS YOU TOWARDS THE CORE OF THE SUN, AND THE STATIC ENERGY WHICH THE SUN HAS OVER THE EARTH. SIMILARLY, THERE IS THE WAVING ENERGY THE EARTH HAS OVER YOU AND A STATIC ENERGY IT HAS OVER YOU.
I WILL USE THE WORD DIRECTLY FROM THE SIDDHAS WHO ARE THE MASTERS IN THE FIELD OF COSMOLOGY. WE HINDUS KNOW ABOUT THE SOLAR AND LUNAR ECLIPSE FROM THE TIME IT IS HAPPENING. FROM THE TIME WE HAPPENED ON PLANET EARTH, STARTED LOOKING UP AND THINKING, WE KNOW THE TRUTH.
FORTUNATELY, WE HAVE RECORDED MANY OF THIS AND MORE FORTUNATELY, STILL A SMALL PART OF OUR KNOWLEDGE RECORDINGS - ORIGINAL VERSES - ARE KEPT AS A LIVING KNOWLEDGE AND PASSED ON SECRETLY THROUGH THE LIVING STREAM OF GURU-DISCIPLE TRADITION.
HINDUISM IS NOT DEAD, IT IS STILL ALIVE. THE WAY SARVAJNA, SARVAJNATVA - ALL KNOWINGNESS - CAN BE TRIGGERED INTO AN INDIVIDUAL’S CONSCIOUSNESS IS STILL ALIVE AND TRANSMITTED FROM GURU TO DISCIPLE. IT MAY BE SMALL, BUT IT STILL EXISTS! FORTUNATELY, PARAMASHIVA HAS BLESSED ME WITH THAT AND PASSED IT TO ME THROUGH MY GURUS.
WITH KALABHAIRAVA AND PARAMASHIVA’S BLESSINGS AND PROTECTION FOR ME AND THE SANGA, I COMMIT WITH THEM, I WILL AWAKEN ATLEAST A FEW MILLION PEOPLE.
THE SUN’S GRAVITY AND THE PLANET EARTH’S GRAVITY ARE IN WAVE FORM AND STATIC FORM. THE SUN HAS TWO FORCES ON US. IN WAVE FORM, IT IS PULLING THE WHOLE EARTH AND ALL OF US TOWARDS ITS CENTER. IN STATIC FORM, IT IS PULLING ALL OF US TOWARDS ITS CORE CENTER. IN THE SAME WAY, THE EARTH, IN WAVE FORM, IS PULLING US TOWARDS ITS CENTER, AND IN STATIC FORM ALSO, IS PULLING US TOWARDS ITS CENTER.
IF YOU UNDERSTAND THIS TRUTH, YOU CAN MANIFEST POWERS IMMEDIATELY.
THE EARTH HAS WAVE GRAVITY (ALAI EERPU), WITH WHICH IT PULLS ALL OF US TOWARDS IT CORE. WHEN YOU STAND, WHAT IS PULLING YOUR FEET TOWARDS THE CENTER OF THE EARTH IS NILAI EERPU - STATIC GRAVITY. IF YOU COGNISE THAT THE EARTH IS A LIVING ENERGY LIKE YOU, THE NILA EERPU LOSES POWER OVER YOU.
THE EARTH IS LIVING BIOLOGY! IT IS NOT DEAD MATTER! THIS IS THE CORE TRUTH OF HINDUISM. BHOOMADEVI, THE LAND ON WHICH YOU ARE STANDING IS ALIVE AS MUCH AS YOU ARE ALIVE IN YOUR SKIN. PUT BOTH YOUR FEET ON THE GROUND AND COGNISE - INSIDE YOUR SKIN HOW MUCH YOU ARE ALIVE, THAT INTENSITY LIFE EXISTS OUTSIDE. THE MOMENT YOU COGNISE THIS, THE STATIC ENERGY LOSES POWER OVER YOU AND THE BIO ENERGY IN YOUR BODY SHOOTS UP!
IF YOU DECIDE, WHICH YOU CAN, THAT YOU ARE ALIVE INSIDE YOUR OWN BODY AND BECAUSE YOU ARE ALIVE INSIDE YOUR BODY, YOU CAN COGNISE THAT ANOTHER BODY IS ALSO ALIVE, THEN START COGNISING THAT EVERYTHING AROUND YOU IS ALIVE - TABLE, CHAIR, HOUSE…
